subtitleNullable: Self-created dataset by scraping the Top 1000 movies link on IMDB with BS
descriptionNullable:
**About the Dataset**

The Dataset was created with the help of BeautifulSoup, by making a web scrapper.
It scrapes the following link at first: https://www.imdb.com/search/title/?count=100&groups=top_1000&sort=user_rating
Then it opens up individual 1000 links of movies and scrapes the budget out of it.

The dataset contains the following columns :
- Title
- Genre
- Duration
- Rating
- Year
- Director
- Major Cast
- 2nd Major Cast
- Certification
- Gross
- Votes
- Link to movie
- Budget


I Hope someone works on making some prediction model/ visualizations over this dataset. Would really appreciate the effort!!

Thank you for reading this and using this dataset!!
title: IMDB_Top1000_Movies
